products.product: Pixelsnap Case for Pixel 10 Pro Fold
products.material: Polycarbonate + magnets + microfiber lining; ≥52% recycled material [1]
products.hinge_protection: No rigid spine; covers back and frame with raised edges, designed not to interfere with folding [1]

products.product: Thin Flex Series Case with Pixelsnap for Pixel 10 Pro Fold
products.material: Polycarbonate shell + synthetic rubber overmold, ≥50% recycled content [3][4]
products.hinge_protection: Open hinge; two‑piece folding design with extra edge layering, allows flat fold [3][4]

products.product: Pixel 10 Pro Fold PixelSnap Case (600D Aramid Fiber)
products.material: 600D aerospace‑grade aramid fiber, very thin shell [5][6][7]
products.hinge_protection: Edge protection only; no hinge bar, but includes front frame + back cover that do not obstruct folding flat [5]

products.product: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Case – Super Thin Aramid Fiber with MagSafe
products.material: 600D aramid fiber with MagSafe ring (variant emphasis) [5][7]
products.hinge_protection: Same thin edge/front coverage; no separate hinge spine [8][5]

products.product: Bridgetown Snap Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Cell Phone Case
products.material: Clear polycarbonate shell strengthened with graphene; up to 73–74% post‑consumer recycled materials [9][10]
products.hinge_protection: Covers back and frames exterior screen; hinge open but designed not to obstruct folding [9][10]

products.product: Thin Flex Series Case with Magnets for Pixel 10 Pro Fold (retail listing)
products.material: Polycarbonate + TPU hybrid with magnets, minimum 50% recycled content [11][3]
products.hinge_protection: Open hinge, two‑piece construction; edges reinforced, folds flat normally [11][3]

products.product: Slim Armor Pro MagFit Case for Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold
products.material: Dual‑layer PC + TPU with internal shock‑absorbing structure [12][8][13]
products.hinge_protection: Full hinge coverage via sliding hinge mechanism that moves as you fold/unfold [12][13]

products.product: Dexnor Magnetic Case for Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold with Dual Kickstands
products.material: TPU + PC full‑body rugged bumper, front frame with screen protector [15]
products.hinge_protection: Full hinge protection with articulated spine cover integrated into bumper [15]

products.product: Poetic Spartan Case for Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold
products.material: Hard polycarbonate shell + TPU bumper with rugged styling [17][8]
products.hinge_protection: Full hinge/spine protection with armored hinge bar [17]

products.product: Aramid Fiber Case for Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold – Slim Hinge Protection & MagSafe
products.material: 1500D aramid fiber texture over thin frame [18]
products.hinge_protection: Full edge and hinge protection; slim hinge guard maintains folding [18]

products.product: Covert Protective Clear Case for Pixel 10 Pro Fold
products.hinge_protection: Open hinge, shock‑absorbing corners and raised edges; does not block folding [19][21]

products.product: UAG Mouve Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Case
products.hinge_protection: Open hinge design with “airy corners” and raised bezels; designed to keep fold function unobstructed [22]

products.material: Premium aramid fiber with matte coating [23]
products.hinge_protection: Edge protection only; hinge left open for zero added bulk and flat folding [23]

products.product: Pixel 10 Pro Fold Hinge‑Safe Slim Magnetic Case (MagSafe/Pixelsnap)
